/usr/local/cuda-9.0/bin/nvcc   -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/foo_cuda.dir/main.cpp.o -o CMakeFiles/foo_cuda.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/targets/aarch64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/usr/local/cuda-9.0/targets/aarch64-linux/lib /usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64/libcudart_static.a -lpthread -ldl  libcuda_lib.a -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt
